popt4jlib

Interface OptimizerIntf

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    LocalOptimizerIntf
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AlternatingVariablesDescent, ArmijoBFGS, ArmijoSteepestDescent, ArmijoSteepestDescentST, DDE, DEA, DFA, DGA, DLS, DPSO, DSA, FletcherConjugateGradient, FletcherConjugateGradientST, MCS, PolakRibiereConjugateGradient, PolakRibiereConjugateGradientST, RandomDescents

    public interface OptimizerIntf
    the interface every optimizer (for unconstrained optimization) must implement.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011

    Company:
